name: College Sex - Episode 2
description:
A visual novel series about the sex lives of two college girls. In this episode, one of them tries to make the other jealous by hitting on her boyfriend.

GAME DESCRIPTION
College Sex is a new visual novel series that follows the story of two attractive young women and their naughty experiences in college.

After their last experience together, certain things remained discussed.
In episode 2, Ivy is aware that her roommate is attracted to her and uses this to her advantage whenever she has the opportunity.
Jade has a hard time seeing her friend naked almost every-day and is frustrated about it.
The story gets complicated when Simon, Ivy’s boyfriend, comes over and Jade decides to hit on him.
What follows after that…we leave it to you to discover!
We promise you a steamy story with high-definitions graphics and realistic-looking characters.
